title: Drawing, "Night Table", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEWYORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: D.; lower right margin in graphite: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'0", 9006/NIGHT/TABLE [circled]; lower right margin in red color pencil: P; dimensions in graphite.
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for night table. Small table with squared corners in back and rounded corners in front. Panel of burled (?) wood on right side of table from front to side; body of table in another wood. Drawer at top with rectangular pull; two open shelves below.
